name: Monkey.D.Luffy
text:
If your leader is multi-colored and your opponent has 5 or more DON!! cards on the field, this Character gains [Rush].
[When Attacking] [Once Per Turn] You may return 2 of your active DON!! cards to your DON!! deck: Set this character as active. Then, add the top card of your life to your hand.

You may return 2 of your active DON!! cards to your DON!! deck: Set this character as active. Then, add the top card of your life to your hand.
